text: [APPLAUSE]
Good evening, everyone.
We're the AlmaPact team.
I'm Tess Michaels.
And I'm Kelly Shaw.

And we are so passionate
about finding ways

to change student loans and
in turn, change student lives.

It's no secret that
there's a student debt
crisis in this country.

In fact, the latest Bloomberg
article says this isn't just
a crisis, it's a catastrophe.

And this catastrophe
is impacting the lives
of 44 million Americans--

a number of whom
may be in this room.

Now, my college roommate--
she was one of those.

With her first job
out of college,

she was unable to afford the
interest rates off her student
loans.

And watching her go through
that stress of figuring out

how she was going
to make this work

made me incredibly
passionate about finding
a solution to this problem.

Now unfortunately,
this $1.5 trillion
market is only getting worse.
There has to be a better way.

And that's exactly
where AlmaPact comes in.

AlmaPact is a
software platform that

connects students and
investors via income share

agreements, which is a much
more flexible form of financing.

Instead of the traditional
principal and interest,

we take a tiny
percent of income--
typically, 2% to 3%--
for a set number of years.

And this reduces the burden
of hefty interest payments
right after graduation.

We recently received
a commitment

from a Wall Street investor
for $6 million of ISA funding.

And we're working hard
to bring on the students
onto the platform.

So together, we believe we can
disrupt the traditional student
loan market.
Please, come join the Pact.
Thank you.
[APPLAUSE]
